name: Portal SFR
description: Portal site of SFR selling box and mobile plans

name: BackOffice Box / Mobile
description: CMS for the PO/PM (project owner/manager) to configure the commercial information for the portal site

name: Migration SpringBoot & Dockerlization
description: Migrate project from Spring MVC to Spring Boot and dockerize the app

name: Recommendations CMS
description: New entry of system CMS which allows to configure the recommendations showed in the shopping cart, based on the items chosen by the clients

name: Automatic Tests
description: Integration testing with Selenium launched during each deployment in different environment

name: Welcome Application Robot Pepper
description: The welcome application installed in a Robot Pepper(a humanoid robot of Softbank), offers useful information for the visitors
